title: Summoner spells and trinket timers
body: Riot i was think if this would be a good idea since it will help the team more better like my idea is that it would be a lot easy if we have the timers for our allies summoner spells flash egnite etc. and trinket display on our screen so we know when to engage or stuff like that and not do stupid mistakes like going in without knowing our team or one of our members spell timers and trinket. COMMENT IF YOU AGREE OR DISAGREE
